title: Synergistic Control of Multilength-Scale Morphology and Vertical Phase Separation for High-Efficiency Organic Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02234C, Paper
Xiaoli Zhou, Wenting Liang, Ruijie Ma, Cuifen Zhang, Zhengxing Peng, Top Archie Padilla Dela Pe√±a, Jiaying Wu, Zaifei Ma, Yaozu Liao, Gang Li, Huawei Hu
Controlling the morphology of organic solar cells (OSCs) presents a significant challenge due to their complex structure and composition. In particular, attaining synergistic control over both the multi-length-scale morphology and...
